mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pay (pay_code, payment_method, payment_status, amount, paid_at) VALUES (#{paycode}, #{paymentmethod}, #{paymentstatus}, #{amount}, #{paidat})
mapper.select: SELECT id, pay_code AS paycode, payment_method AS paymentmethod, payment_status AS paymentstatus, amount, paid_at AS paidat FROM pay ORDER BY paid_at DESC
